backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining dialogue, activities, moments, letters, and per-player game state with start/continue methods and basic availability query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping offline‑mode and gameplay‑persistence features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of key frontend files including app flow, UI screens, game systems, and state management.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for diagnosing and retrying failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide covering canister uptime, status checks, and limits around automatic restarts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling startup, screen routing, backend availability checks, and offline/online game launch logic.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Defines the local‑only admin username gate and related storage key.
Defines activity data including trust effects and optional unlockable moments.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Zustand-powered audio manager that loads, controls, and plays looping background music.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: 3D Puro character model with idle animation and click-to-open dialogue interaction.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Touch-based joystick, look controls, and jump button overlay for mobile devices.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard and joystick input into unified movement/look state and jump handling.
Zustand store for raw input values including joystick, look deltas, and jump requests.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: List of customizable environment items with allowed placement locations.
Dialogue tree containing nodes, choices, trust effects, and branching paths.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Main game view component that initializes game state, mounts the 3D scene, plays music, and renders all UI overlays and menus.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Provides keyword-based letter response generation using categorized template arrays.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a book-sorting mini-game where players drag books into categories and affect trust.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Displays a slideshow of Puro's drawings, granting trust as each is viewed.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Runs a timed hide-and-seek game with randomized hiding spots and trust changes based on performance.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Provides a menu interface to launch various mini-games and handles their completion and closing.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Renders a scene viewer for story moments, showing the title, scene text, and a close button.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Defines moment data entries with titles, descriptions, scenes, and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Implements the 3D library scene with movement, jumping physics, camera control, and lighting.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines a persisted Zustand game store managing trust, dialogue, activities, letters, customization, endings, and UI visibility with related actions.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Defines ending data and provides a function to select an ending based on trust thresholds.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the ending scene based on trust level, unlocks the ending, and allows starting a new game or returning to the title.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders a menu of activities that adjust trust, mark completion, unlock moments, and close after selection.
Allows placing discovered items in the library and displays both placed and available customization items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Handles dialogue progression with trust-based choices and updates the current dialogue node or closes the panel.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: Lets players write letters, auto-generates responses, and shows an inbox of sent letters and replies.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays a list of story moments, showing locked or unlocked states and allowing playback of unlocked moments.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Renders the pause menu with resume, quick-access navigation, settings, reset, and admin terminal options.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Provides audio settings with mute and volume controls and a back button.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows the player's trust level using a labeled progress bar with color indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health status with React Query and provides a helper for one-off availability checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for backend game operations like fetching game state, making choices, and updating progress.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a custom color/typography theme for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Handles one‑time startup logic including storage checks and asset preloading.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store for a simple username‑based local admin gate with persistence.
Empty placeholder file for future server‑access state logic.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for entering or locking the local admin gate username with feedback messages.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays the game’s credits, description, and a return button with a themed background.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin‑only diagnostic terminal overlay enabling command input, scrolling output, and keyboard toggle.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Shows user‑friendly and detailed error info when game launch fails, with retry and navigation options.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: A React error boundary that catches game runtime errors and displays a UI with optional technical details and a return-to-title button.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Displays a colored status indicator showing backend server health based on availability state.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements a simple command parser for the in‑game terminal, supporting help, clear, diagnostics, and server status checks.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into readable text lines for terminal display.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal state, output lines, input logging, and open/close behavior.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the game’s title screen with buttons, server status, admin tools, and offline notices depending on backend availability.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw launch errors into categorized, user‑friendly summaries while preserving original error text.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Explains the startup module, initialization steps, and how App.tsx invokes the startup sequence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains project version, a high-level description of the game, extensive architectural notes about backend dependencies and admin controls, and a list of known issues including deployment errors and conflicting requirements. Used as the master record of project state and technical constraints.
